means: 驳斥，驳倒( refute的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: They refuted the "sophistries of the economists".
sentence.Network_cn: 他们驳斥了“经济学家们似是而非的观点”。
他们批驳了他的错误观点.

PerfectNetExp.abs: he refuted local media reports saying she was brain dead but acknowledged that she had suffered severe brain trauma .这使他和教会发生了冲突.
今日新闻: Stalled talks get a boost... ... torpedoed: 被破坏的 refuted: 被反驳的 be thoroughly refuted: 被她骂得狗血喷头.
We have refuted him in the press ., 我们在报上驳了他.

list.abs: ...refutation of argument ground 反驳论据反驳论据refutational defense 驳斥性防卫refute 驳斥
resolution proof tree 分解证明树resolution refutation 归结反演，分解反驳resolution theorem proving 归结定理证明
refutable 可驳的refutable formula 可驳公式region 区域
反驳过程 refutation process反驳树 refutation tree否认字元 regative acknowledge character
refutation 反驳refutation tree 反驳树，反演树regenerative memory 再生存储器

entry.tran: 驳倒，驳斥，批驳（观点、指责或理论）
entry.def: If you refute an argument, accusation, or theory, you prove that it is wrong or untrue.

example.ex: It was the kind of rumour that it is impossible to refute.
example.tran: 这是那种让人根本没法批驳的谣言。

entry.def: If you refute an argument or accusation, you say that it is not true.

example.ex: Isabelle is quick to refute any suggestion of intellectual snobbery.
example.tran: 伊莎贝尔对于任何关于她恃才傲物的暗示都迅速予以否认。

auth_sentence.content: The concept that genetics are random is hopelessly refuted.
auth_sentence.res_content: The concept that genetics are random is hopelessly refuted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The concept that genetics are random is hopelessly refuted.

auth_sentence.content: It gets worse when stupid proposals are refuted ironically.
auth_sentence.res_content: It gets worse when stupid proposals are refuted ironically.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It gets worse when stupid proposals are refuted ironically.

auth_sentence.content: They engaged with and refuted Trotsky's arguments.
auth_sentence.res_content: They engaged with and refuted Trotsky's arguments.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They engaged with and refuted Trotsky's arguments.
